mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_HOME_MANAGER H LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M ON H.HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M.MN_KEYNO WHERE HM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND HM_KEYNO = #{HM_KEYNO}
SELECT * FROM T_HOME_MANAGER H LEFT JOIN T_MENU_MANAGER M ON H.HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = M.MN_KEYNO WHERE HM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = #{HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C}
SELECT count(*) FROM T_MENU_MANAGER WHERE MN_ORDER = #{MN_ORDER} AND (REPLACE(MN_MAINKEY,' ','') IS NULL OR REPLACE(MN_MAINKEY,' ','') = '') AND MN_LEV = '0' AND MN_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MN_USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE T_MENU_MANAGER SET MN_ORDER = MN_ORDER+1 WHERE MN_ORDER >= #{MN_ORDER} AND (REPLACE(MN_MAINKEY,' ','') IS NULL OR REPLACE(MN_MAINKEY,' ','') = '') AND MN_LEV = '0' AND MN_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MN_USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T_USERINFO_AUTHORITY A LEFT JOIN T_HOME_AUTHORITY_MANAGER B ON A.UIA_KEYNO = B.UIA_KEYNO AND B.HM_KEYNO = #{HM_KEYNO} WHERE UIA_DIVISION = 'A'

SELECT C.HAM_DEFAULT_URL FROM T_MENU_MANAGER A LEFT JOIN T_HOME_MANAGER B ON A.MN_KEYNO = B.HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C LEFT JOIN T_HOME_AUTHORITY_MANAGER C ON B.HM_KEYNO = C.HM_KEYNO AND C.UIA_KEYNO = #{UIA_KEYNO} WHERE MN_URL = #{URL}
SELECT HM_TILES FROM T_HOME_MANAGER A, T_MENU_MANAGER B WHERE A.HM_MN_HOMEDIV_C = B.MN_KEYNO AND A.HM_DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.MN_URL = '/'||#{tiles}
